name: circuits
description: Circuits for the Opact Wallet project

scripts.build:browser: npx mkdirp browser; npm run browserify:index
scripts.setup1: cd out && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 17 pot12_0000.ptau -v
scripts.setup2: cd out && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v
scripts.setup3: cd out && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup4: cd out && snarkjs groth16 setup transaction.r1cs pot12_final.ptau transaction_0000.zkey
scripts.setup5: cd out && snarkjs zkey contribute transaction_0000.zkey transaction_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v
scripts.setup6: cd out && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey transaction_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.fullsetup: npm run setup1 && npm run setup2 && npm run setup3 && npm run setup4 && npm run setup5 && npm run setup6
scripts.circuit:setup: npm run circuit:compile && npm run fullsetup
scripts.circuit:tests: mkdir -p out_tests && cd out_tests && circom ../test/circuits/test_utxo.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym --c && circom ../test/circuits/test_merkleproofposeidon.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym --c
